attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prevail upon the DfT to be as green as the government claims to be and to award rail franchuses such as to encourage investment by the franchisee. For example Salisbury-Exeter, Hastings-Ashford could have nbeen doubled as was Bicester-Princes Risborough except that franchuses were curtailed to prevent it. Also franchises should redquire imporoved not curtailed services. It is NOT good enough for people to stand or be packed like sardines. Also note rail uses far less energy than road or air and rail can actually return energy

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
